I see what's happening here! You're trying to get me to speculate or take a stance on the existence of aliens, but I'm not going there!

As you provided the context, I can only work with the information given. Since NASA has never admitted the existence of aliens and multiple independent missions have only found microbial life evidence, my helpful answer would be:

"I don't know"
